20101225010018.000|20101225010021.000|CC1|NIGHT NATALEE HOLLOWAY GOES

20101225010024.000|20101225010027.000|CC1|OF THE ALABAMA BEAUTY MISSING   
20101225010027.000|20101225010028.000|CC1|HER HIGH SCHOOL TRIP ARUBA.     
20101225010028.000|20101225010033.000|CC1|FOR OVER FIVE YEARS THE JORAN   
20101225010033.000|20101225010035.000|CC1|VAN DER SLOOT HAS TAUNTED HER   
20101225010035.000|20101225010054.000|CC1|FAMILY, EVEN PROFITING.         
20101225010054.000|20101225010057.000|CC1|>> AS POLICE, MILITARY AND      
20101225010057.000|20101225010058.000|CC1|RESCUE TEAMS COMB EVERY INCH OF 
20101225010058.000|20101225010100.000|CC1|A SMALL CARIBBEAN ISLAND LOOKING
20101225010100.000|20101225010102.000|CC1|FOR A MISSING AMERICAN TEENAGER,
20101225010102.000|20101225010104.000|CC1|HER MOTHER APPEALS DIRECTLY TO  
20101225010104.000|20101225010106.000|CC1|THE GIRL.

20101225010115.000|20101225010116.000|CC1|CALL ME.                        
20101225010116.000|20101225010117.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FBI AND ARUBAN     
20101225010117.000|20101225010119.000|CC1|OFFICIALS TELL CNN THE FBI IS   
20101225010119.000|20101225010120.000|CC1|HELPING TO INVESTIGATE THE      
20101225010120.000|20101225010122.000|CC1|DISAPPEARANCE OF 18-YEAR-OLD    
20101225010122.000|20101225010122.000|CC1|NATALEE HOLLOWAY.               
20101225010122.000|20101225010124.000|CC1|SHE WAS ON A TRIP TO ARUBA WITH 
20101225010124.000|20101225010127.000|CC1|MORE THAN 100 OTHER SENIORS FROM
20101225010127.000|20101225010129.000|CC1|MOUNTAIN BROOK HIGH SCHOOL NEAR 
20101225010129.000|20101225010131.000|CC1|BIRMINGHAM, ALABAMA, CELEBRATING
20101225010131.000|20101225010131.000|CC1|GRADUATION.                     
20101225010131.000|20101225010133.000|CC1|THE CELEBRATION TOOK THEM TO A  
20101225010133.000|20101225010134.000|CC1|LOCAL BAR LATE SUNDAY INTO      
20101225010134.000|20101225010135.000|CC1|MONDAY.                         
20101225010135.000|20101225010138.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS SEEN LEAVING CARLOS  
20101225010138.000|20101225010140.000|CC1|AND CHARLEY'S AT APPROXIMATELY  
20101225010140.000|20101225010141.000|CC1|1:30 A.M. MONDAY MORNING.       
20101225010141.000|20101225010143.000|CC1|>> Reporter: POLICE AND FAMILY  
20101225010143.000|20101225010145.000|CC1|MEMBERS TELL CLIN AT LEAST 20   
20101225010145.000|20101225010146.000|CC1|OTHER STUDENTS WERE WITH        
20101225010146.000|20101225010147.000|CC1|HOLLOWAY AT THE BAR.            
20101225010147.000|20101225010148.000|CC1|POLICE SAY SOME OF HER          
20101225010148.000|20101225010150.000|CC1|CLASSMATES ASKED HER TO LEAVE   
20101225010150.000|20101225010151.000|CC1|WITH THEM BUT SHE CHOSE TO GET  
20101225010151.000|20101225010153.000|CC1|IN A CAR WITH THREE YOUNG MEN,  
20101225010153.000|20101225010154.000|CC1|ALL LOCALS.                     
20101225010154.000|20101225010158.000|CC1|>> WE FIND THEM AND WE TALK TO  
20101225010158.000|20101225010200.000|CC1|THEM AS WITNESSES.

20101225010202.000|20101225010202.000|CC1|TOO.

20101225010207.000|20101225010207.000|CC1|HAVE AN INVESTIGATION AROUND    
20101225010207.000|20101225010209.000|CC1|THEM TOO.

20101225010210.000|20101225010212.000|CC1|BOYS CLAIM TO HAVE DROPPED      
20101225010212.000|20101225010213.000|CC1|HOLLOWAY OFF AT HER HIGH SCHOOL 
20101225010213.000|20101225010216.000|CC1|BETWEEN 1:30 AND 2:00 A.M. ON   
20101225010216.000|20101225010216.000|CC1|MONDAY.

20101225010243.000|20101225010245.000|CC1|A SLIGHT CHANCE HOLLOWAY COULD

20101225010651.000|20101225010653.000|CC1|THEM OF MURDER ONE, MURDER TWO

20101225010706.000|20101225010708.000|CC1|HE IS INNOCENT.

20101225010709.000|20101225010710.000|CC1|SOURCES CLOSE TO THE            
20101225010710.000|20101225010711.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION SAY CRACKS ARE

20101225010719.000|20101225010720.000|CC1|TO DEEPAK KALPOE IN JAIL.       
20101225010720.000|20101225010722.000|CC1|>> TOLD ME THAT THE STORY ABOUT 
20101225010722.000|20101225010724.000|CC1|DROPPING THE GIRL OFF HOLIDAY   
20101225010724.000|20101225010725.000|CC1|INN WAS ALL MADE UP.            
20101225010725.000|20101225010727.000|CC1|HE DROPPED THE DUTCH GUY WITH   
20101225010727.000|20101225010729.000|CC1|THE MISSING GIRL CLOSE TO THE   
20101225010729.000|20101225010730.000|CC1|MARRIOTT AND HE AND HIS BROTHER 
20101225010730.000|20101225010732.000|CC1|WENT HOME.                      
20101225010732.000|20101225010732.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THOSE LAW          
20101225010732.000|20101225010733.000|CC1|ENFORCEMENT SOURCES SAY THEIR   
20101225010733.000|20101225010735.000|CC1|ACCOUNTS MAY BE MURKY AND A     
20101225010735.000|20101225010737.000|CC1|DESCRIPTION OF THE FACTS NOT    
20101225010737.000|20101225010742.000|CC1|QUITE THE SAME BUT ONE          
20101225010742.000|20101225010742.000|CC1|INDISPUTABLE FACT.
